flawed_nl_solution:
The first value drop of the lawnmower was 25/100 * 100 = $<<25/100*100=25>>25.
So the lawnmower was worth 100 - 25 = $<<100-25=75>>75.
Over the next year, the value dropped another 20/100 * 75 = $<<20/100*75=51>>51.
So after all this time, Ben's lawnmower is worth 75 - 51 = $<<75-51=24>>24.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
